text:
No, the `~` operator in HubL concatenates values, just like `+` in JavaScript. You see there is a `size` property followed by a `size_unit` property, so your CSS rule will be something like:
`font-size: 24px`
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/operators-and-expression-tests#other-hubl-operators>
